item.description:
My wife has surprise plans for Friday evening, which means I'm on my own, so I'm opening the door for up to three gamers who want to play a few somewhat more complicated strategy games, possibly World Without End and most likely Fresco (which isn't all that complicated). I'd love to give Last Train to Wensleydale a playing as well, but we'll see.

RSVP if you're in, and note the 8:00 pm start time. Since Linda won't be around, I'll need to make sure my son is tucked away prior to folks showing up for games.

Eric

P.S. And if you can't make this event, I plan to host a similar one on Saturday, Sept. 11. Linda's busy this weekend!
item.name: Gaming in Concord, NH
